attributes.action: stop bbc charging for content online like top gear or blackberry apps or.any other media when my licence is valid iv paid bbc already
attributes.additional_details: Stop bbc charging for online content which should be free as I have already paid the bbc via my licence. Things like top gear on blackberry world and other online devices android etc. After paying £140+ for a channel that's in the governments pocket and a licence. fee which is extreme just to watch to pay per view via the back door surely after paying all that money are we not entitled to complete free content online if to has anything to do with bbc
